title: MacFormat magazine logo
content:
MacFormat is a Mac magazine in the UK. I know the tagline at the top is set in some form of Myriad, but I have no idea about the “Mac”. I’ve run it though various different identifiers, all to no avail.

The logo attached is from [their website](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828111448/http:/www.macformat.co.uk/).

Thanks,  
Ted

author: tedwinder
